entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 this evening. Forecast issued 8:24 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Periods of snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:24 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
